call…answer/cry…Here I am. The Lord will be near us and will readily grant that which we seek in righteous prayer.

yoke. See 58:6.

putting forth of the finger. This is a gesture of insult (Prov. 6:13). Isa. 59:3 speaks of hands "defiled with blood" and fingers "with iniquity"; perhaps this expression refers to using the fingers (or hands) to harm another or steal his property.

speaking vanity. "Vain speaking" might include "malicious talk" (NIV), "spreading vicious rumors" (LB), "speaking wickedness" (RSV), and["lay[ing] false charges" (NEB). Avoiding these is part of the spirit of fasting.
